titles: Epigrams of that most wittie and worthie epigrammatist Mr. Iohn Owen, Gentleman. Translated by Iohn Vicars
author: Owen, John, 1560?-1622.
Vicars, John, 1579 or 80-1652.
publisher: Printed by W[illiam] S[tansby] for Iohn Smethwicke, and are to be sold at his shop in S. Dunstanes Church-yard vnder the Dyall,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
